title: For Mom
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Many children love doing things for their moms. For Mom provides examples of acts that children do for their moms through vivid photographs and simple text. The book can also be used to teach students to classify information as well as identify verbs.
meta: carry, clean, cook, draw, mom, read, sing, sleep, smile
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words for and I

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
